'''Emaita''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

{{Description|Emaita inclines her head and gestures to a wagon loaded with kegs.}}
A pleasant vendor selling drinks to visitors and denizens of Periki's Overlook.

## Interactions

{{Interactions

|wares           = All the basic drink types in infinite amounts.

|other           =
}}
